trans-unit.source: Visit the [Azure Portal].
trans-unit.target: Visit the [Azure Portal].

trans-unit.source: Click **Browse All** > **Mobile Apps** > the backend that you just created.
trans-unit.target: Click **Browse All** > **Mobile Apps** > the backend that you just created.

trans-unit.source: In the mobile
trans-unit.target: In the mobile

trans-unit.source: app settings, click **Quickstart** > **Cordova**.
trans-unit.target: app settings, click **Quickstart** > **Cordova**.

trans-unit.source: Under **Configure your client application**, select **Create a New App**,
trans-unit.target: Under **Configure your client application**, select **Create a New App**,

trans-unit.source: then click **Download**.
trans-unit.target: then click **Download**.

trans-unit.source: This downloads a complete Cordova project for an app pre-configured to connect to your backend.
trans-unit.target: This downloads a complete Cordova project for an app pre-configured to connect to your backend.

trans-unit.source: Unpack the downloaded ZIP file to a directory on your hard drive.
trans-unit.target: Unpack the downloaded ZIP file to a directory on your hard drive.

trans-unit.source: Open the project using **Visual Studio**.
trans-unit.target: Open the project using **Visual Studio**.

trans-unit.source: Click on **Open** > **Project/Solution...**.
trans-unit.target: Click on **Open** > **Project/Solution...**.

trans-unit.source: Find the _sitename_.sln file and click **Open**.
trans-unit.target: Find the _sitename_.sln file and click **Open**.

trans-unit.source: The default emulator is **Ripple - Nexus (Galaxy)**.
trans-unit.target: The default emulator is **Ripple - Nexus (Galaxy)**.

trans-unit.source: Click the drop-down arrow next to the emulator and select **Google Android Emulator**.
trans-unit.target: Click the drop-down arrow next to the emulator and select **Google Android Emulator**.

trans-unit.source: Click on **Google Android Emulator**.
trans-unit.target: Click on **Google Android Emulator**.

trans-unit.source: The project will be built and then run.
trans-unit.target: The project will be built and then run.

trans-unit.source: You may see a network security warning from the
trans-unit.target: You may see a network security warning from the

trans-unit.source: Google Android Emulator requesting access to the network.
trans-unit.target: Google Android Emulator requesting access to the network.

trans-unit.source: Eventually, the Google Android Emulator will be shown and your application will run.
trans-unit.target: Eventually, the Google Android Emulator will be shown and your application will run.

trans-unit.source: In the app, type meaningful text, such as _Complete the tutorial_ and then click the 'Add' button.
trans-unit.target: In the app, type meaningful text, such as _Complete the tutorial_ and then click the 'Add' button.

trans-unit.source: This sends a POST request to the
trans-unit.target: This sends a POST request to the

trans-unit.source: Azure backend you deployed earlier.
trans-unit.target: Azure backend you deployed earlier.

trans-unit.source: The backend inserts data from the request is into the TodoItem SQL table, and returns information
trans-unit.target: The backend inserts data from the request is into the TodoItem SQL table, and returns information

trans-unit.source: about the newly stored items back to the mobile app.
trans-unit.target: about the newly stored items back to the mobile app.

trans-unit.source: The mobile app displays this data in the list.
trans-unit.target: The mobile app displays this data in the list.
